2723 過郭代公故宅
gwo3 gwok3 doi6 gung1 gu3 zaak6

豪俊初未遇，其迹或脫略
hou4 zeon3 co1 mei6 jyu6, kei4 zik1 waak6 tyut3 loek6
-----------------------------------------------------
代公尉通泉，放意何自若
doi6 gung1 wai3 tung1 cyun4, fong3 ji3 ho4 zi6 joek6
-----------------------------------------------------
及夫登衮冕，直氣森噴薄
kap6 fu1 dang1 gwan2 min5, zik6 hei3 sam1 pan3 bok6
-----------------------------------------------------
磊落見異人，豈伊常情度
leoi5 lok6 gin3 ji6 jan4, hei2 ji1 soeng4 cing4 dok6
-----------------------------------------------------
定策神龍後，宮中翕清廓
ding6 caak3 san4 lung4 hau6, gung1 zung1 jap1 cing1 gwok3
-----------------------------------------------------
俄頃辨尊親，指揮存顧托
ngo4 king2 bin6 zyun1 can1, zi2 fai1 cyun4 gu3 tok3
-----------------------------------------------------
羣公有慚色，王室無削弱
kwan4 gung1 jau5 caam4 sik1, wong4 sat1 mou4 soek3 joek6
-----------------------------------------------------
迥出名臣上，丹青照臺閣
gwing2 ceot1 ming4 san4 soeng6, daan1 cing1 ziu3 toi4 gok3
-----------------------------------------------------
我行得遺迹，池館皆疏鑿
ngo5 hang4 dak1 wai4 zik1, ci4 gun2 gaai1 so1 zok6
-----------------------------------------------------
壯公臨事斷，顧步涕橫落
zong3 gung1 lam4 si6 dyun6, gu3 bou6 tai3 waang4 lok6
-----------------------------------------------------
高詠寶劍篇，神交付冥寞
gou1 wing6 bou2 gim3 pin1, san4 gaau1 fu6 ming4 mok6

gun1 sit3 zik1 siu2 bou2 syu1 waa6 bik1

siu2 bou2 jau5 gu2 fung1, dak1 zi1 sim2 gaau1 pin1
-----------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------

wat1 wat1 saam1 daai6 zi6, gaau1 lung4 kap1 soeng1 cin4
-----------------------------------------------------

jau6 fai1 sai1 fong1 bin3, faat3 dei6 fu4 uk1 jyun4
-----------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------

2743 漁陽
jyu4 joeng4

-----------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------
祿山北築雄武城，舊防敗走歸其營

繫書請問燕耆舊，今日何須十萬兵

=====================================================

將適吳楚，留別章使君留後兼幕府諸公，得柳字
zoeng1 sik1 ng4 co2, lau4 bit6 zoeng1 si3 gwan1 lau4 hau6 gim1 mok6 fu2 zyu1 gung1, dak1 lau5 zi6

我來入蜀門，歲月亦已久
ngo5 loi4 jap6 suk6 mun4, seoi3 jyut6 jik6 ji5 gau2
-----------------------------------------------------
豈唯長兒童，自覺成老醜
hei2 wai4 coeng4 ji4 tung4, zi6 gok3 sing4 lou5 cau2
-----------------------------------------------------
常恐性坦率，失身爲杯酒
soeng4 hung2 sing3 taan2 seot1, sat1 san1 wai6 bui1 zau2
-----------------------------------------------------
近辭痛飲徒，折節萬夫後
gan6 ci4 tung3 jam2 tou4, zit3 zit3 maan6 fu1 hau5
-----------------------------------------------------
昔如縱壑魚，今如喪家狗
sik1 jyu4 zung3 kok3 jyu4, gam1 jyu4 song1 gaa1 gau2
-----------------------------------------------------
旣無遊方戀，行止復何有
gei3 mou4 jau4 fong1 lyun2, hang4 zi2 fau6 ho4 jau5
-----------------------------------------------------
相逢半新故，取別隨薄厚
soeng1 fung4 bun3 san1 gu3, ceoi2 bit6 ceoi4 bok6 hau5
-----------------------------------------------------
不意青草湖，扁舟落吾手
bat1 ji3 cing1 cou2 wu4, pin1 zau1 lok6 ng4 sau2
-----------------------------------------------------
眷眷章梓州，開筵俯高柳
gyun3 gyun3 zoeng1 zi2 zau1, hoi1 jin4 fu2 gou1 lau5
-----------------------------------------------------
樓前出騎馬，帳下羅賓友
lau4 cin4 ceot1 kei3 maa5, zoeng3 haa6 lo4 ban1 jau5
-----------------------------------------------------
健兒簸紅旗，此樂或難朽
gin6 ji4 bo3 hung4 kei4, ci2 lok6 waak6 naan4 nau2
-----------------------------------------------------
日車隱崑崙，鳥雀噪戶牖
jat6 geoi1 jan2 kwan1 leon4, niu5 zoek3 cou3 wu6 jau5
-----------------------------------------------------
波濤未足畏，三峽徒雷吼

-----------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------

zung1 jyun4 siu1 sik1 dyun6, wong4 uk1 gam1 on1 fau2
-----------------------------------------------------
終作適荆蠻，安排用莊叟
zung1 zok3 sik1 ging1 maan4, on1 paai4 jung6 zong1 sau2
-----------------------------------------------------
隨雲拜東皇，挂席上南斗
ceoi4 wan4 baai3 dung1 wong4, gwaa3 zik6 soeng5 naam4 dau2
-----------------------------------------------------
有使卽寄書，無使長回首
jau5 si3 zik1 gei3 syu1, mou4 si3 coeng4 wui4 sau2

3036 傷春五首
soeng1 ceon1 ng5 sau2

其一

tin1 haa6 bing1 seoi1 mun5, ceon1 gwong1 jat6 zi6 nung4
-----------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------

ji2 zoeng6 hon1 gu1 sek6, king1 wu4 zau6 cin2 saa1
-----------------------------------------------------

3141 草堂

-----------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------

3200 丹青引
daan1 cing1 jan5

將軍魏武之子孫，於今爲庶爲清門
zoeng1 gwan1 ngai6 mou5 zi1 zi2 syun1, jyu1 gam1 wai4 syu3 wai4 cing1 mun4
-----------------------------------------------------
英雄割據雖已矣，文彩風流今尙存

-----------------------------------------------------
學書初學衞夫人，但恨無過王右軍

-----------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------

3229 揚旗
joeng4 kei4

江雨颯長夏，府中有餘清
gong1 jyu5 saap3 coeng4 haa6, fu2 zung1 jau5 jyu4 cing1
-----------------------------------------------------
我公會賓客，肅肅有異聲
ngo5 gung1 wui6 ban1 haak3, suk1 suk1 jau5 ji6 sing1
-----------------------------------------------------
初筵閱軍裝，羅列照廣庭
co1 jin4 jyut6 gwan1 zong1, lo4 lit6 ziu3 gwong2 ting4
-----------------------------------------------------
庭空六馬入，駊騀揚旗旌
ting4 hung1 luk6 maa5 jap6, po2 ngo5 joeng4 kei4 zing1
-----------------------------------------------------
迴迴偃飛蓋，熠熠逬流星
wui4 wui4 jin2 fei1 goi3, jap1 jap1 bing3 lau4 sing1
-----------------------------------------------------
來纏風飈急，去擘山岳傾
loi4 cin4 fung1 biu1 gap1, heoi3 maak3 saan1 ngok6 king1
-----------------------------------------------------
材歸俯身盡，妙取略地平
coi4 gwai1 fu2 san1 zeon6, miu6 ceoi2 loek6 dei6 ping4
-----------------------------------------------------
虹霓就掌握，舒卷隨人輕
hung4 ngai4 zau6 zoeng2 ak1, syu1 gyun2 ceoi4 jan4 hing1

【補充說明】
〚2:14.1.5〛「一柱觀」之「觀」字，爲頸鏈出句末字，按詩律當讀仄聲。注作
平聲者，誤。此「觀」字另見於3405《渝州候嚴六侍御不到先下峽》、4180《送
李功曹之荆州充鄭侍御判官重贈》，均爲五律（非首聯）出句末字，俱讀仄聲。
〚2:〛開、苦、觀、北，出句四聲輪用。

別唐十五誡，因寄禮部賈侍郎
bit6 tong4 sap6 ng5 gaai3, jan1 gei3 lai5 bou6 gaa2 si6 long4

九載一相逢，百年能幾何
gau2 zoi2 jat1 soeng1 fung4, baak3 nin4 nang4 gei2 ho4
-----------------------------------------------------
復爲萬里別，送子山之阿
fau6 wai4 maan6 lei5 bit6, sung3 zi2 saan1 zi1 o1
-----------------------------------------------------
白鶴久同林，潛魚本同河
baak6 hok6 gau2 tung4 lam4, cim4 jyu4 bun2 tung4 ho4
-----------------------------------------------------
未知栖集期，衰老強高歌
mei6 zi1 cai1 zaap6 kei4, seoi1 lou5 koeng5 gou1 go1
-----------------------------------------------------
歌罷兩悽惻，六龍忽蹉跎
go1 baa6 loeng5 cai1 cak1, luk6 lung4 fat1 co1 to4
-----------------------------------------------------
相視髮皓白，況難駐羲和
soeng1 si6 faat3 hou6 baak6, fong3 naan4 zyu3 hei1 wo4
-----------------------------------------------------
胡星墜燕地，漢將仍橫戈
wu4 sing1 zeoi6 jin1 dei6, hon3 zoeng3 jing4 waang4 gwo1
-----------------------------------------------------
蕭條四海內，人少豺虎多
siu1 tiu4 sei3 hoi2 noi6, jan4 siu2 caai4 fu2 do1
-----------------------------------------------------
少人愼莫投，多虎信所過
siu2 jan4 san6 mok6 tau4, do1 fu2 seon3 so2 gwo1
-----------------------------------------------------
飢有易子食，獸猶畏虞羅
gei1 jau5 ji6 zi2 sik6, sau3 jau4 wai3 jyu4 lo4
-----------------------------------------------------
子負經濟才，天門鬱嵯峨
zi2 fu6 ging1 zai3 coi4, tin1 mun4 wat1 co1 ngo4
-----------------------------------------------------
飄颻適東周，來往若崩波
piu1 jiu4 sik1 dung1 zau1, loi4 wong5 joek6 bang1 bo1
-----------------------------------------------------
南宮吾故人，白馬金盤陀
naam4 gung1 ng4 gu3 jan4, baak6 maa5 gam1 pun4 to4
-----------------------------------------------------
雄筆映千古，見賢心靡他
hung4 bat1 jing2 cin1 gu2, gin3 jin4 sam1 mei5 to4
-----------------------------------------------------
念子善師事，歲寒守舊柯
nim6 zi2 sin6 si1 si6, seoi3 hon4 sau2 gau6 o1
-----------------------------------------------------
爲吾謝賈公，病肺臥江沱
wai6 ng4 ze6 gaa2 gung1, bing6 fai3 ngo6 gong1 to4

-----------------------------------------------------

gwan1 hon1 leoi5 lok6 si6, bat1 hang2 ji6 kei4 san1

dong6 dong6 maan6 huk6 syun4, jing2 joek6 joeng4 baak6 hung4
-----------------------------------------------------

hei2 coeng4 bit1 zeoi1 ngau4, gwaa3 zik6 zaap6 zung3 gung1
-----------------------------------------------------

zi6 fei1 fung1 dung6 tin1, mok6 zi3 daai6 seoi2 zung1

其三

lit6 si6 wu3 do1 mun4, siu2 jan4 zi6 tung4 diu6
-----------------------------------------------------
名利苟可取，殺身傍權要
ming4 lei6 gau2 ho2 ceoi2, saat3 san1 bong6 kyun4 jiu3
-----------------------------------------------------

ho4 dong1 gun1 cou4 cing1, ji5 bui3 ham1 jat1 siu3

3612 貽華陽柳少府

hai6 maa5 kiu4 muk6 gaan1, man6 jan4 je5 zi6 mun4

lau5 hau4 pei1 ji1 siu3, gin3 ngo5 ngaan4 sik1 wan1

3619 雷

大旱山岳焦，密雲復無雨

-----------------------------------------------------

naam4 fong1 zoeng3 lai6 dei6, lei4 ci2 nung4 si6 fu2

-----------------------------------------------------

buk6 wong1 waak6 cin4 man4, bin1 mou4 fei1 kai1 gu2
-----------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------

七月三日亭午已後，校熱退，晚加小涼，穩睡有詩，因論壯年樂事，戲呈元二十一曹長
cat1 jyut6 saam1 jat6 ting4 ng5 ji5 hau6, gaau3 jit6 teoi3, maan5 gaa1 siu2 loeng4, wan2 seoi6 jau5 si1, jan1 leon6 zong3 nin4 lok6 si6, hei3 cing4 jyun4 ji6 sap6 jat1 cou4 coeng4

今茲商用事，餘熱亦已末
gam1 zi1 soeng1 jung6 si6, jyu4 jit6 jik6 ji5 mut6
-----------------------------------------------------
衰年旅炎方，生意從此活
seoi1 nin4 leoi5 jim4 fong1, sang1 ji3 cung4 ci2 wut6
-----------------------------------------------------

ting4 ng5 gaam2 hon6 lau4, bak1 leon4 noi6 jan4 kut3
-----------------------------------------------------

maan5 fung1 song2 wu1 hap1, gan1 lik6 sou1 ceoi1 zit3
-----------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------
灑落唯清秋，昏霾一空闊

-----------------------------------------------------

3686 種萵苣
zung2 wo1 geoi6

旣雨已秋，堂下理小畦，隔種一兩席許萵苣，向二旬矣，而苣不甲坼，獨野莧青青，傷時君子，或晚得微祿，轗軻不進，因作此詩
gei3 jyu5 ji5 cau1, tong4 haa6 lei5 siu2 kwai4, gaak3 zung3 jat1 loeng5 zik6 heoi2 wo1 geoi6, hoeng3 ji6 ceon4 ji5, ji4 geoi6 bat1 gaap3 caak3, duk6 je5 jin6 cing1 cing1, soeng1 si4 gwan1 zi2, waak6 maan5 dak1 mei4 luk6, ham2 ho2 bat1 zeon3, jan1 zok3 ci2 si1

〚12.2.5〛灑，據韻典網引《廣韻》，紙韻。
〚25.2.5〛篚，平水韻屬尾韻；據韻典網引《洪武正韻牋》，紙韻。
四紙、五尾，鄰韻。

3694 雨
jyu5

峽雲行清曉，煙霧相徘徊
haap6 wan4 hang4 cing1 hiu2, jin1 mou6 soeng1 pui4 wui4
-----------------------------------------------------
風吹蒼江樹，雨灑石壁來
fung1 ceoi1 cong1 gong1 syu6, jyu5 saa2 sek6 bik1 loi4
-----------------------------------------------------
淒淒生餘寒，殷殷兼出雷
cai1 cai1 sang1 jyu4 hon4, jan1 jan1 gim1 ceot1 leoi4
-----------------------------------------------------
白谷變氣候，朱炎安在哉
baak6 guk1 bin3 hei3 hau6, zyu1 jim4 on1 zoi6 zoi1
-----------------------------------------------------
高鳥濕不下，居人門未開
gou1 niu5 sap1 bat1 haa6, geoi1 jan4 mun4 mei6 hoi1
-----------------------------------------------------
楚宮久已滅，幽珮爲誰哀
co2 gung1 gau2 ji5 mit6, jau1 pui3 wai6 seoi4 oi1
-----------------------------------------------------
侍臣書王夢，賦有冠古才
si6 san4 syu1 wong4 mung6, fu3 jau5 gun3 gu2 coi4
-----------------------------------------------------
冥冥翠龍駕，多自巫山臺
ming4 ming4 ceoi3 lung4 gaa3, do1 zi6 mou4 saan1 toi4

3698 雨
jyu5

行雲遞崇高，飛雨靄而至
hang4 wan4 dai6 sung4 gou1, fei1 jyu5 oi2 ji4 zi3
-----------------------------------------------------
潺潺石間溜，汩汩松上駛
saan4 saan4 sek6 gaan1 lau6, gwat1 gwat1 cung4 soeng6 sai2
-----------------------------------------------------
亢陽乘秋熱，百穀皆已棄

-----------------------------------------------------

wong4 tin1 dak1 zaak6 gong3, ziu1 gyun2 jau5 sang1 ji3
-----------------------------------------------------

cin4 jyu5 soeng1 zeot1 bou6, gam1 jyu5 hei2 jung4 ji6
-----------------------------------------------------

bat1 ho2 mou4 leoi4 ting4, gaan3 zok3 gu2 zang1 hei3
-----------------------------------------------------
佳聲達中宵，所望時一致
gaai1 sing1 daat6 zung1 siu1, so2 mong6 si4 jat1 zi3
-----------------------------------------------------
清霜九月天，髣髴見滯穗
cing1 soeng1 gau2 jyut6 tin1, fong2 fat1 gin3 zai6 seoi6
-----------------------------------------------------
郊扉及我私，我圃日蒼翠
gaau1 fei1 kap6 ngo5 si1, ngo5 pou2 jat6 cong1 ceoi3
-----------------------------------------------------
恨無抱甕力，庶減臨江費

3702 雨二首
jyu5 ji6 sau2

其一

青山淡無姿，白露誰能數
cing1 saan1 daam6 mou4 zi1, baak6 lou6 seoi4 nang4 sou3
-----------------------------------------------------
片片水上雲，蕭蕭沙中雨

-----------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------
羣盜下辟山，總戎備強敵
kwan4 dou6 haa6 pik1 saan1, zung2 jung4 bei6 koeng4 dik6
-----------------------------------------------------
水深雲光廓，鳴櫓各有適
seoi2 sam1 wan4 gwong1 kwok3, ming4 lou5 gok3 jau5 sik1
-----------------------------------------------------
漁艇自悠悠，夷歌負樵客
jyu4 teng5 zi6 jau4 jau4, ji4 go1 fu6 ciu4 haak3
-----------------------------------------------------

3726 贈李十五丈別
zang6 lei5 sap6 ng5 zoeng6 bit6

峽人鳥獸居，其室附層巓
haap6 jan4 niu5 sau3 geoi1, kei4 sat1 fu6 cang4 din1
-----------------------------------------------------
下臨不測江，中有萬里船
haa6 lam4 bat1 cak1 gong1, zung1 jau5 maan6 lei5 syun4
-----------------------------------------------------
多病紛倚薄，少留改歲年
do1 bing6 fan1 ji2 bok6, siu2 lau4 goi2 seoi3 nin4
-----------------------------------------------------
絕域誰慰懷，開顏喜名賢
zyut6 wik6 seoi4 wai3 waai4, hoi1 ngaan4 hei2 ming4 jin4
-----------------------------------------------------
孤陋忝末親，等級敢比肩
gu1 lau6 tim2 mut6 can1, dang2 kap1 gam2 bei2 gin1
-----------------------------------------------------
人生意氣合，相與襟袂連
jan4 sang1 ji3 hei3 hap6, soeng1 jyu5 kam1 mai6 lin4
-----------------------------------------------------
一日兩遣僕，三日一共筵
jat1 jat6 loeng5 hin2 buk6, saam1 jat6 jat1 gung6 jin4
-----------------------------------------------------
揚論展寸心，壯筆過飛泉
joeng4 leon4 zin2 cyun3 sam1, zong3 bat1 gwo3 fei1 cyun4
-----------------------------------------------------
玄成美價存，子山舊業傳
jyun4 sing4 mei5 gaa3 cyun4, zi2 saan1 gau6 jip6 cyun4
-----------------------------------------------------
不聞八尺軀，常受眾目憐
bat1 man4 baat3 cek3 keoi1, soeng4 sau6 zung3 muk6 lin4
-----------------------------------------------------
且爲辛苦行，蓋被生事牽
ce2 wai6 san1 fu2 hang4, goi3 pei5 sang1 si6 hin1
-----------------------------------------------------
北迴白帝棹，南入黔陽天
bak1 wui4 baak6 dai3 zaau6, naam4 jap6 kim4 joeng4 tin1
-----------------------------------------------------
汧公制方隅，迥出諸侯先
hin1 gung1 zai3 fong1 jyu4, gwing2 ceot1 zyu1 hau4 sin1
-----------------------------------------------------
封內如太古，時危獨蕭然
fung1 noi6 jyu4 taai3 gu2, si4 ngai4 duk6 siu1 jin4
-----------------------------------------------------
清高金莖露，正直朱絲絃
cing1 gou1 gam1 hang1 lou6, zing3 zik6 zyu1 si1 jin4
-----------------------------------------------------
昔在堯四岳，今之黃潁川
sik1 zoi6 jiu4 sei3 ngok6, gam1 zi1 wong4 wing6 cyun1
-----------------------------------------------------
于邁恨不同，所思無由宣
jyu1 maai6 han6 bat1 tung4, so2 si1 mou4 jau4 syun1
-----------------------------------------------------
山深水增波，解榻秋露懸
saan1 sam1 seoi2 zang1 bo1, gaai2 taap3 cau1 lou6 jyun4
-----------------------------------------------------
客遊雖云久，主要月再圓

〚3:21.2.7〛貢，據韻典網、漢典，東韻。
〚4:26.2.4〛祲，去聲。

=====================================================

3785 夜
je6

露下天高秋水清，空山獨夜旅魂驚
lou6 haa6 tin1 gou1 cau1 seoi2 cing1, hung1 saan1 duk6 je6 leoi5 wan4 ging1
仄仄平平平仄平，平平仄仄仄平平
-----------------------------------------------------
疏燈自照孤帆宿，新月猶懸雙杵鳴
so1 dang1 zi6 ziu3 gu1 faan4 suk1, san1 jyut6 jau4 jyun4 soeng1 cyu5 ming4
平平仄仄平平仄，平仄平平平仄平
-----------------------------------------------------
南菊再逢人臥病，北書不至雁無情
naam4 guk1 zoi3 fung4 jan4 ngo6 bing6, bak1 syu1 bat1 zi3 ngaan6 mou4 cing4
平仄仄平平仄仄，仄平仄仄仄平平
-----------------------------------------------------
步簷倚仗看牛斗，銀漢遙應接鳳城
bou6 jim4 ji2 zoeng6 hon1 ngau4 dau2, ngan4 hon3 jiu4 jing1 zip3 fung6 sing4
仄平仄仄平平仄，平仄平平仄仄平

【韻部】
〚3.1.7〛清：庚韻
〚3.2.7〛驚：庚韻
〚4.2.7〛鳴：庚韻
〚5.2.7〛情：庚韻
〚6.2.7〛城：庚韻

【體裁】
七律

3789 秋興八首
cau1 hing3 baat3 sau2

其一

玉露凋傷楓樹林，巫山巫峽氣蕭森
juk6 lou6 diu1 soeng1 fung1 syu6 lam4, mou4 saan1 mou4 haap6 hei3 siu1 sam1
仄仄平平平仄平，平平平仄仄平平
-----------------------------------------------------
江間波浪兼天湧，塞上風雲接地陰
gong1 gaan1 bo1 long6 gim1 tin1 jung2, coi3 soeng6 fung1 wan4 zip3 dei6 jam1
平平平仄平平仄，仄仄平平仄仄平
-----------------------------------------------------
叢菊兩開他日淚，孤舟一繫故園心
cung4 guk1 loeng5 hoi1 taa1 jat6 leoi6, gu1 zau1 jat1 hai6 gu3 jyun4 sam1
平仄仄平平仄仄，平平仄仄仄平平
-----------------------------------------------------

平平仄仄平平仄，仄仄平平仄仄平

-----------------------------------------------------
畫省香爐違伏枕，山樓粉堞隱悲笳

仄仄平平平仄仄，平平仄仄仄平平
-----------------------------------------------------
請看石上藤蘿月，已映洲前蘆荻花
cing2 hon1 sek6 soeng6 tang4 lo4 jyut6, ji5 jing2 zau1 cin4 lou4 dik6 faa1
仄平仄仄平平仄，仄仄平平平仄平

其三

平平平仄仄平平，仄仄平平仄仄平
-----------------------------------------------------

3863 聽楊氏歌
ting1 joeng4 si6 go1


佳人絕代歌，獨立發皓齒
gaai1 jan4 zyut6 doi6 go1, duk6 lap6 faat3 hou6 ci2
-----------------------------------------------------
滿堂慘不樂，響下清虛裏
mun5 tong4 caam2 bat1 lok6, hoeng2 haa6 cing1 heoi1 leoi5
-----------------------------------------------------
江城帶素月，況乃清夜起
gong1 sing4 daai3 sou3 jyut6, fong3 naai5 cing1 je6 hei2
-----------------------------------------------------
老夫悲暮年，壯士淚如水
lou5 fu1 bei1 mou6 nin4, zong3 si6 leoi6 jyu4 seoi2
-----------------------------------------------------
玉杯久寂寞，金管迷宮徵
juk6 bui1 gau2 zik6 mok6, gam1 gun2 mai4 gung1 zi2
-----------------------------------------------------
勿云聽者疲，愚智心盡死
mat6 wan4 ting1 ze2 pei4, jyu4 zi3 sam1 zeon6 sei2
-----------------------------------------------------
古來傑出士，豈特一知己
gu2 loi4 git6 ceot1 si6, hei2 dak6 jat1 zi1 gei2
-----------------------------------------------------
吾聞昔秦青，傾側天下耳
ng4 man4 sik1 ceon4 cing1, king1 zak1 tin1 haa6 ji5

gwan1 san4 soeng6 leon6 bing1, zoeng1 seoi3 zip3 jin3 gai3
-----------------------------------------------------
朗吟六公篇，憂來豁蒙蔽
long5 jam4 luk6 gung1 pin1, jau1 loi4 kut3 mung4 bai3


故祕書少監武功蘇公源明
gu3 bei3 syu1 siu2 gaam1 mou5 gung1 sou1 gung1 jyun4 ming4

武功少也孤，徒步客徐兗
mou5 gung1 siu2 jaa5 gu1, tou4 bou6 haak3 ceoi4 jin5
-----------------------------------------------------
讀書東岳中，十歲考墳典
duk6 syu1 dung1 ngok6 zung1, sap6 seoi3 haau2 fan4 din2
-----------------------------------------------------
時下萊蕪郭，忍飢浮雲巘
si4 haa6 loi4 mou4 gwok3, jan2 gei1 fau4 wan4 jin5
-----------------------------------------------------
負米晚爲身，每食臉必泫
fu6 mai5 maan5 wai4 san1, mui5 sik6 lim5 bit1 jyun5
-----------------------------------------------------
夜字照爇薪，垢衣生碧蘚
je6 zi6 ziu3 jyut3 san1, gau3 ji1 sang1 bik1 sin2
-----------------------------------------------------
庶以勤苦志，報茲劬勞願
syu3 ji5 kan4 fu2 zi3, bou3 zi1 keoi4 lou4 jyun6
-----------------------------------------------------
學蔚醇儒姿，文包舊史善
hok6 wai3 seon4 jyu4 zi1, man4 baau1 gau6 si2 sin6
-----------------------------------------------------
灑落辭幽人，歸來潛京輦
saa2 lok6 ci4 jau1 jan4, gwai1 loi4 cim4 ging1 lin5
-----------------------------------------------------
射君東堂策，宗匠集精選
se6 gwan1 dung1 tong4 caak3, zung1 zoeng6 zaap6 zing1 syun2
-----------------------------------------------------
制可題未乾，乙科已大闡
zai3 ho2 tai4 mei6 gon1, jyut6 fo1 ji5 daai6 zin2
-----------------------------------------------------
文章日自負，吏祿亦累踐
man4 zoeng1 jat6 zi6 fu6, lei6 luk6 jik6 leoi5 cin5
-----------------------------------------------------
晨趨閶闔內，足踏宿昔趼
san4 ceoi1 coeng1 hap6 noi6, zuk1 daap6 suk1 sik1 gin2
-----------------------------------------------------
一麾出守還，黃屋朔風卷
jat1 fai1 ceot1 sau2 waan4, wong4 uk1 sok3 fung1 gyun2
-----------------------------------------------------
不暇陪八駿，虜庭悲所遣
bat1 haa6 pui4 baat3 zeon3, lou5 ting4 bei1 so2 hin2
-----------------------------------------------------
平生滿尊酒，斷此朋知展
ping4 sang1 mun5 zeon1 zau2, dyun6 ci2 pang4 zi1 zin2
-----------------------------------------------------
憂憤病二秋，有恨石可轉
jau1 fan5 bing6 ji6 cau1, jau5 han6 sek6 ho2 zyun2
-----------------------------------------------------
肅宗復社稷，得無逆順辨
suk1 zung1 fuk6 se5 zik1, dak1 mou4 jik6 seon6 bin6
-----------------------------------------------------
范曄顧其兒，李斯憶黃犬
faan6 jip6 gu3 kei4 ji4, lei5 si1 jik1 wong4 hyun2
-----------------------------------------------------
祕書茂松色，再扈祠壇墠
bei3 syu1 mau6 cung4 sik1, zoi3 wu6 ci4 taan4 sin6
-----------------------------------------------------
前後百卷文，枕藉皆禁臠
cin4 hau6 baak3 gyun2 man4, zam2 zik6 gaai1 gam3 lyun5
-----------------------------------------------------
篆刻揚雄流，溟漲本末淺
syun6 hak1 joeng4 hung4 lau4, ming4 zoeng3 bun2 mut6 cin2
-----------------------------------------------------
青熒芙蓉劍，犀兕豈獨剸
cing1 jing4 fu4 jung4 gim3, sai1 zi6 hei2 duk6 zyun2
-----------------------------------------------------
反爲後輩褻，予實苦懷緬
faan2 wai4 hau6 bui3 sit3, jyu5 sat6 fu2 waai4 min5
-----------------------------------------------------
煌煌齋房芝，事絕萬手搴
wong4 wong4 zaai1 fong4 zi1, si6 zyut6 maan6 sau2 hin2
-----------------------------------------------------
垂之俟來者，正始貞勸勉
seoi4 zi1 zi6 loi4 ze2, zing3 ci2 zing1 hyun3 min5
-----------------------------------------------------
不要懸黃金，胡爲投乳贙
bat1 jiu1 jyun4 wong4 gam1, wu4 wai4 tau4 jyu5 jyun6
-----------------------------------------------------
結交三十載，吾與誰遊衍
git3 gaau1 saam1 sap6 zoi2, ng4 jyu5 seoi4 jau4 jin2
-----------------------------------------------------
滎陽復冥寞，罪罟已橫罥
jing4 joeng4 fau6 ming4 mok6, zeoi6 gu2 ji5 waang4 gyun3
-----------------------------------------------------
嗚呼子逝日，始泰則終蹇
wu1 fu1 zi2 sai6 jat6, ci2 taai3 zak1 zung1 gin2
-----------------------------------------------------
長安米萬錢，凋喪盡餘喘
coeng4 on1 mai5 maan6 cin4, diu1 song3 zeon6 jyu4 cyun2
-----------------------------------------------------
戰伐何當解，歸帆阻清沔
zin3 fat6 ho4 dong1 gaai2, gwai1 faan4 zo2 cing1 min5
-----------------------------------------------------
尙纏漳水疾，永負蒿里餞
soeng6 cin4 zoeng1 seoi2 zat6, wing5 fu6 hou1 lei5 zin3


故著作郎貶台州司戶滎陽鄭公虔
gu3 zyu3 zok3 long4 bin2 toi4 zau1 si1 wu6 jing4 joeng4 zeng6 gung1 kin4

鶢鶋至魯門，不識鐘鼓饗
jyun4 geoi1 zi3 lou5 mun4, bat1 sik1 zung1 gu2 hoeng2
-----------------------------------------------------
孔翠望赤霄，愁思雕籠養
hung2 ceoi3 mong6 cik3 siu1, sau4 si3 diu1 lung4 joeng5
-----------------------------------------------------
滎陽冠眾儒，早聞名公賞
jing4 joeng4 gun3 zung3 jyu4, zou2 man4 ming4 gung1 soeng2
-----------------------------------------------------
地崇士大夫，況乃氣精爽
dei6 sung4 si6 daai6 fu1, fong3 naai5 hei3 zing1 song2
-----------------------------------------------------
天然生知姿，學立游夏上
tin1 jin4 sang1 zi1 zi1, hok6 lap6 jau4 haa6 soeng5
-----------------------------------------------------
神農或闕漏，黃石愧師長
san4 nung4 waak6 kyut3 lau6, wong4 sek6 kwai3 si1 zoeng2
-----------------------------------------------------
藥纂西極名，兵流指諸掌
joek6 zyun2 sai1 gik6 ming4, bing1 lau4 zi2 zyu1 zoeng2
-----------------------------------------------------
貫穿無遺恨，薈蕞何技癢
gun3 cyun1 mou4 wai4 han6, wai3 zeoi3 ho4 gei6 joeng5
-----------------------------------------------------
圭臬星經奧，蟲篆丹青廣
gwai1 jit6 sing1 ging1 ou3, cung4 syun6 daan1 cing1 gwong2
-----------------------------------------------------
子雲窺未遍，方朔諧太枉
zi2 wan4 kwai1 mei6 pin3, fong1 sok3 haai4 taai3 wong2
-----------------------------------------------------
神翰顧不一，體變鍾兼兩
san4 hon6 gu3 bat1 jat1, tai2 bin3 zung1 gim1 loeng5
-----------------------------------------------------
文傳天下口，大字猶在牓
man4 cyun4 tin1 haa6 hau2, daai6 zi6 jau4 zoi6 bong2
-----------------------------------------------------
昔獻書畫圖，新詩亦俱往
sik1 hin3 syu1 waa6 tou4, san1 si1 jik6 keoi1 wong5
-----------------------------------------------------
滄洲動玉陛，寡鶴誤一響
cong1 zau1 dung6 juk6 bai6, gwaa2 hok6 ng6 jat1 hoeng2
-----------------------------------------------------
三絕自御題，四方尤所仰
saam1 zyut6 zi6 jyu6 tai4, sei3 fong1 jau4 so2 joeng5
-----------------------------------------------------
嗜酒益疏放，彈琴視天壤
si3 zau2 jik1 so1 fong3, taan4 kam4 si6 tin1 joeng5
-----------------------------------------------------
形骸實土木，親近唯几杖
jing4 hoi4 sat6 tou2 muk6, can1 gan6 wai4 gei2 zoeng6
-----------------------------------------------------
未曾寄官曹，突兀倚書幌
mei6 cang4 gei3 gun1 cou4, dat6 ngat6 ji2 syu1 fong2
-----------------------------------------------------
晚就芸香閣，胡塵昏坱莽
maan5 zau6 wan4 hoeng1 gok3, wu4 can4 fan1 joeng5 mong5
-----------------------------------------------------
反覆歸聖朝，點染無滌盪
faan2 fuk1 gwai1 sing3 ciu4, dim2 jim5 mou4 dik6 dong6
-----------------------------------------------------
老蒙台州掾，泛泛浙江槳
lou5 mung4 toi4 zau1 jyun6, faan3 faan3 zit3 gong1 zoeng2
-----------------------------------------------------
覆穿四明雪，飢拾楢溪橡
fuk1 cyun1 sei3 ming4 syut3, gei1 sap6 jau4 kai1 zoeng6
-----------------------------------------------------
空聞紫芝歌，不見杏壇丈
hung1 man4 zi2 zi1 go1, bat1 gin3 hang6 taan4 zoeng6
-----------------------------------------------------
天長眺東南，秋色餘魍魎
tin1 coeng4 tiu3 dung1 naam4, cau1 sik1 jyu4 mong5 loeng5
-----------------------------------------------------
別離慘至今，班白徒懷曩
bit6 lei4 caam2 zi3 gam1, baan1 baak6 tou4 waai4 nong5
-----------------------------------------------------
春深秦山秀，葉墜清渭朗
ceon1 sam1 ceon4 saan1 sau3, jip6 zeoi6 cing1 wai6 long5
-----------------------------------------------------
劇談王侯門，野稅林下鞅
kek6 taam4 wong4 hau4 mun4, je5 seoi3 lam4 haa6 joeng2
-----------------------------------------------------
操紙終夕酣，時物集遐想
cou1 zi2 zung1 zik6 ham4, si4 mat6 zaap6 haa4 soeng2
-----------------------------------------------------
詞場竟疏闊，平昔濫推獎
ci4 coeng4 ging2 so1 fut3, ping4 sik1 laam6 teoi1 zoeng2
-----------------------------------------------------
百年見存沒，牢落吾安放
baak3 nin4 gin3 cyun4 mut6, lou4 lok6 ng4 on1 fong2
-----------------------------------------------------
蕭條阮咸在，出處同世網
siu1 tiu4 jyun2 haam4 zoi6, ceot1 cyu2 tung4 sai3 mong5
-----------------------------------------------------
他日訪江樓，含悽述飄蕩
taa1 jat6 fong2 gong1 lau4, ham4 cai1 seot6 piu1 dong6


故右僕射相國張公九齡
gu3 jau6 buk6 je6 soeng1 gwok3 zoeng1 gung1 gau2 ling4

相國生南紀，金璞無留礦
soeng1 gwok3 sang1 naam4 gei2, gam1 pok3/pik3 mou4 lau4 kwong3/kong3
-----------------------------------------------------
仙鶴下人間，獨立霜毛整
sin1 hok6 haa6 jan4 gaan1/gaan3, duk6 lap6 soeng1 mou4 zing2
-----------------------------------------------------
矯然江海思，復與雲路永
giu2 jin4 gong1 hoi2 si1, fau6 jyu5 wan4 lou6 wing5
-----------------------------------------------------
寂寞想土階，未遑等箕潁
zik6 mok6 soeng2 tou2 gaai1, mei6 wong4 dang2 gei1 wing5
-----------------------------------------------------

soeng5 gwan1 baak6 juk6 tong4, ji2 gwan1 gam1 waa4 saang2
-----------------------------------------------------
碣石歲崢嶸，天池日蛙黽
kit3 sek6 seoi3 zang1 wing4, tin1 ci4 jat6 waa1 maang5
-----------------------------------------------------

teoi3 sik6 jam4 daai6 ting4, ho4 sam1 gei3 zeon1 gang2
-----------------------------------------------------

gwat1 ging1 wai3 nong5 zit3, can2 bin3 fu6 jan4 ging2
-----------------------------------------------------
雖蒙換蟬冠，右地恧多幸
seoi1 mung4 wun6 sim4 gun1, jau6 dei6 nuk1 do1 hang6
-----------------------------------------------------
敢忘二疏歸，痛迫蘇耽井
gam2 mong4 ji6 so1 gwai1, tung3 baak1 sou1 daam1 zing2
-----------------------------------------------------
紫綬映暮年，荆州謝所領
zi2 sau6 jing2 mou6 nin4, ging1 zau1 ze6 so2 ling5
-----------------------------------------------------
庾公興不淺，黃霸鎭每靜
jyu5 gung1 hing3 bat1 cin2, wong4 baa3 zan3 mui5 zing6
-----------------------------------------------------
賓客引調同，諷詠在務屛
ban1 haak3 jan5 diu6 tung4, fung3 wing6 zoi6 mou6 bing2
-----------------------------------------------------

si1 baa6 dei6 jau5 jyu4, pin1 zung1 jyu5 cing1 sing2
-----------------------------------------------------
一陽發陰管，淑氣含公鼎
jat1 joeng4 faat3 jam1 gun2, suk6 hei3 ham4 gung1 ding2
-----------------------------------------------------
乃知君子心，用才文章境
naai5 zi1 gwan1 zi2 sam1, jung6 coi4 man4 zoeng1 ging2
-----------------------------------------------------
散帙起翠螭，倚薄巫廬並
saan3 dit6 hei2 ceoi3 ci1, ji2 bok6 mou4 lou4 bing6
-----------------------------------------------------
綺麗玄暉擁，牋誄任昉騁
ji2 lai6 jyun4 fai1 jung2, zin1 loi6 jam6 fong2 cing2
-----------------------------------------------------
自我一家則，未缺隻字警
zi6 ngo5 jat1 gaa1 zak1, mei6 kyut3 zek3 zi6 ging2
-----------------------------------------------------
千秋滄海南，名繫朱鳥影
cin1 cau1 cong1 hoi2 naam4, ming4 hai6 zyu1 niu5 jing2
-----------------------------------------------------
歸老守故林，戀闕悄延頸
gwai1 lou5 sau2 gu3 lam4, lyun2 kyut3 ciu2 jin4 ging2
-----------------------------------------------------
波濤良史筆，蕪絕大庾嶺
bo1 tou4 loeng4 si2 bat1, mou4 zyut6 daai6 jyu5 ling5

向時禮數隔，制作難上請
hoeng3 si4 lai5 sou3 gaak3, zai3 zok3 naan4 soeng6 cing2
-----------------------------------------------------

zoi3 duk6 ceoi4 jyu4 bei1, jau4 si1 lei5 jin1 teng5

4083 壯遊
zong3 jau4

往昔十四五，出遊翰墨場
wong5 sik1 sap6 sei3 ng5, ceot1 jau4 hon6 mak6 coeng4
-----------------------------------------------------
斯文崔魏徒，以我似班揚
si1 man4 ceoi1 ngai6 tou4, ji5 ngo5 ci5 baan1 joeng4
-----------------------------------------------------
七齡思卽壯，開口詠鳳凰
cat1 ling4 si1 zik1 zong3, hoi1 hau2 wing6 fung6 wong4
-----------------------------------------------------
九齡書大字，有作成一囊
gau2 ling4 syu1 daai6 zi6, jau5 zok3 sing4 jat1 nong4
-----------------------------------------------------
性豪業嗜酒，嫉惡懷剛腸
sing3 hou4 jip6 si3 zau2, zat6 ok3 waai4 gong1 coeng4
-----------------------------------------------------
脫略小時輩，結交皆老蒼
tyut3 loek6 siu2 si4 bui3, git3 gaau1 gaai1 lou5 cong1
-----------------------------------------------------
飲酣視八極，俗物都茫茫
jam2 ham4 si6 baat3 gik6, zuk6 mat6 dou1 mong4 mong4
-----------------------------------------------------
東下姑蘇臺，已具浮海航
dung1 haa6 gu1 sou1 toi4, ji5 geoi6 fau4 hoi2 hong4
-----------------------------------------------------
到今有遺恨，不得窮扶桑
dou3 gam1 jau5 wai4 han6, bat1 dak1 kung4 fu4 song1
-----------------------------------------------------
王謝風流遠，闔廬丘墓荒
wong4 ze6 fung1 lau4 jyun5, hap6 lou4 jau1 mou6 fong1
-----------------------------------------------------
劍池石壁仄，長洲荷芰香
gim3 ci4 sek6 bik1 zak1, coeng4 zau1 ho4 gei6 hoeng1
-----------------------------------------------------
嵯峨閶門北，清廟映迴塘
co1 ngo4 coeng1 mun4 bak1, cing1 miu6 jing2 wui4 tong4
-----------------------------------------------------
每趨吳太伯，撫事淚浪浪
mui5 ceoi1 ng4 taai3 baak3, fu2 si6 leoi6 long4 long4
-----------------------------------------------------
枕戈憶句踐，渡浙想秦皇
zam2 gwo1 jik1 gau1 cin5, dou6 zit3 soeng2 ceon4 wong4
-----------------------------------------------------
蒸魚聞匕首，除道哂要章
zing1 jyu4 man4 bei3 sau2, ceoi4 dou6 can2 jiu3 zoeng1
-----------------------------------------------------
越女天下白，鏡湖五月涼
jyut6 neoi5 tin1 haa6 baak6, geng3 wu4 ng5 jyut6 loeng4
-----------------------------------------------------
剡溪蘊秀異，欲罷不能忘
sim6 kai1 wan5 sau3 ji6, juk6 baa6 bat1 nang4 mong4
-----------------------------------------------------
歸帆拂天姥，中歲貢舊鄕
gwai1 faan4 fat1 tin1 mou5, zung1 seoi3 gung3 gau6 hoeng1
-----------------------------------------------------
氣劘屈賈壘，目短曹劉牆
hei3 mo4 wat1 gaa2 leoi5, muk6 dyun2 cou4 lau4 coeng4
-----------------------------------------------------
忤下考功第，獨辭京尹堂
ng5 haa6 haau2 gung1 dai6, duk6 ci4 ging1 wan5 tong4
-----------------------------------------------------
放蕩齊趙間，裘馬頗清狂
fong3 dong6 cai4 ziu6 gaan1, kau4 maa5 po2 cing1 kwong4
-----------------------------------------------------
春歌叢臺上，冬獵青丘旁
ceon1 go1 cung4 toi4 soeng6, dung1 lip6 cing1 jau1 pong4
-----------------------------------------------------
呼鷹皁櫪林，逐獸雲雪岡
fu1 jing1 zou6 lik1 lam4, zuk6 sau3 wan4 syut3 gong1
-----------------------------------------------------
射飛曾縱鞚，引臂落𪃩鶬
se6 fei1 cang4 zung3 hung3, jan5 bei3 lok6 cau1 cong1
-----------------------------------------------------
蘇侯據鞍喜，忽如攜葛強
sou1 hau4 geoi3 on1 hei2, fat1 jyu4 kwai4 got3 koeng4
-----------------------------------------------------
快意八九年，西歸到咸陽
faai3 ji3 baat3 gau2 nin4, sai1 gwai1 dou3 haam4 joeng4
-----------------------------------------------------
許與必詞伯，賞遊實賢王
heoi2 jyu5 bit1 ci4 baak3, soeng2 jau4 sat6 jin4 wong4
-----------------------------------------------------
曳裾置醴地，奏賦入明光
jai6 geoi1 zi3 lai5 dei6, zau3 fu3 jap6 ming4 gwong1
-----------------------------------------------------
天子廢食召，羣公會軒裳
tin1 zi2 fai3 sik6 ziu6, kwan4 gung1 wui6 hin1 soeng4
-----------------------------------------------------
脫身無所愛，痛飲信行藏
tyut3 san1 mou4 so2 oi3, tung3 jam2 seon3 hang4 cong4
-----------------------------------------------------
黑貂不免敝，班鬢兀稱觴
hak1 diu1 bat1 min5 bai6, baan1 ban3 ngat6 cing1 soeng1
-----------------------------------------------------
杜曲晚耆舊，四郊多白楊
dou6 kuk1 maan5 kei4 gau6, sei3 gaau1 do1 baak6 joeng4
-----------------------------------------------------
坐深鄕黨敬，日覺死生忙
zo6 sam1 hoeng1 dong2 ging3, jat6 gok3 sei2 sang1 mong4
-----------------------------------------------------
朱門任傾奪，赤族迭罹殃
zyu1 mun4 jam6 king1 dyut6, cik3 zuk6 dit6 lei4 joeng1
-----------------------------------------------------
國馬竭粟豆，官雞輸稻粱
gwok3 maa5 kit3 suk1 dau6, gun1 gai1 syu1 dou6 loeng4
-----------------------------------------------------
舉隅見煩費，引古惜興亡
geoi2 jyu4 gin3 faan4 fai3, jan5 gu2 sik1 hing1 mong4
-----------------------------------------------------
河朔風塵起，岷山行幸長
ho4 sok3 fung1 can4 hei2, man4 saan1 hang4 hang6 coeng4
-----------------------------------------------------
兩宮各警蹕，萬里遙相望
loeng5 gung1 gok3 ging2 bat1, maan6 lei5 jiu4 soeng1 mong4
-----------------------------------------------------
崆峒殺氣黑，少海旌旗黃
hung1 tung4 saat3 hei3 hak1, siu3 hoi2 zing1 kei4 wong4
-----------------------------------------------------
禹功亦命子，涿鹿親戎行
jyu5 gung1 jik6 ming6 zi2, doek3 luk6 can1 jung4 hong4
-----------------------------------------------------
翠華擁吳岳，螭虎噉豺狼
ceoi3 waa4 jung2 ng4 ngok6, ci1 fu2 daam6 caai4 long4
-----------------------------------------------------
爪牙一不中，胡兵更陸梁
zaau2 ngaa4 jat1 bat1 zung3, wu4 bing1 gang3 luk6 loeng4
-----------------------------------------------------
大軍載草草，凋瘵滿膏肓
daai6 gwan1 zoi3 cou2 cou2, diu1 zaai3 mun5 gou1 fong1
-----------------------------------------------------
備員竊補衮，憂憤心飛揚
bei6 jyun4 sit3 bou2 gwan2, jau1 fan5 sam1 fei1 joeng4
-----------------------------------------------------
上感九廟焚，下憫萬民瘡
soeng6 gam2 gau2 miu6 fan4, haa6 man5 maan6 man4 cong1
-----------------------------------------------------
斯時伏青蒲，廷爭守御牀
si1 si4 fuk6 cing1 pou4, ting4 zang1 sau2 jyu6 cong4
-----------------------------------------------------
君辱敢愛死，赫怒幸無傷
gwan1 juk6 gam2 oi3 sei2, haak1 nou6 hang6 mou4 soeng1
-----------------------------------------------------
聖哲體仁恕，宇縣復小康
sing3 zit3 tai2 jan4 syu3, jyu5 jyun6 fau6 siu2 hong1
-----------------------------------------------------
哭廟灰燼中，鼻酸朝未央
huk1 miu6 fui1 zeon6 zung1, bei6 syun1 ziu1 mei6 joeng1
-----------------------------------------------------
小臣議論絕，老病客殊方
siu2 san4 ji5 leon6 zyut6, lou5 bing6 haak3 syu4 fong1
-----------------------------------------------------
鬱鬱苦不展，羽翮困低昂
wat1 wat1 fu2 bat1 zin2, jyu5 hat6 kwan3 dai1 ngong4
-----------------------------------------------------
秋風動哀壑，碧蕙捐微芳
cau1 fung1 dung6 oi1 kok3, bik1 wai6 gyun1 mei4 fong1
-----------------------------------------------------
之推避賞從，漁父濯滄浪
zi1 teoi1 bei6 soeng2 zung6, jyu4 fu2 zok6 cong1 long4
-----------------------------------------------------
榮華敵勳業，歲暮有嚴霜
wing4 waa4 dik6 fan1 jip6, seoi3 mou6 jau5 jim4 soeng1
-----------------------------------------------------
吾觀鴟夷子，才格出尋常
ng4 gun1 ci1 ji4 zi2, coi4 gaak3 ceot1 cam4 soeng4
-----------------------------------------------------
羣凶逆未定，側佇英俊翔
kwan4 hung1 jik6 mei6 ding6, zak1 cyu5 jing1 zeon3 coeng4

4110 昔遊
sik1 jau4

昔者與高李，晚登單父臺
sik1 ze2 jyu5 gou1 lei5, maan5 dang1 sin6 fu2 toi4
-----------------------------------------------------
寒蕪際碣石，萬里風雲來
hon4 mou4 zai3 kit3 sek6, maan6 lei5 fung1 wan4 loi4
-----------------------------------------------------
桑柘葉如雨，飛藿共徘徊
song1 ze3 jip6 jyu4 jyu5, fei1 fok3 gung6 pui4 wui4
-----------------------------------------------------
清霜大澤凍，禽獸有餘哀
cing1 soeng1 daai6 zaak6 dung3, kam4 sau3 jau5 jyu4 oi1
-----------------------------------------------------
是時倉廩實，洞達寰區開
si6 si4 cong1 lam5 sat6, dung6 daat6 waan4 keoi1 hoi1
-----------------------------------------------------
猛士思滅胡，將帥望三台
maang5 si6 si1 mit6 wu4, zoeng3 seoi3 mong6 saam1 toi4
-----------------------------------------------------
君王無所惜，駕馭英雄材
gwan1 wong4 mou4 so2 sik1, gaa3 jyu6 jing1 hung4 coi4
-----------------------------------------------------
幽燕盛用武，供給亦勞哉
jau1 jin1 sing6 jung6 mou5, gung1 kap1 jik6 lou4 zoi1
-----------------------------------------------------
吳門轉粟帛，泛海陵蓬萊
ng4 mun4 zyun2 suk1 baak6, faan3 hoi2 ling4 pung4 loi4
-----------------------------------------------------
肉食三十萬，獵射起黃埃
juk6 sik6 saam1 sap6 maan6, lip6 se6 hei2 wong4 oi1
-----------------------------------------------------
隔河憶長眺，青歲已摧頹
gaak3 ho4 jik1 coeng4 tiu3, cing1 seoi3 ji5 ceoi1 teoi4
-----------------------------------------------------
不及少年日，無復故人杯
bat1 kap6 siu2 nin4 jat6, mou4 fau6 gu3 jan4 bui1
-----------------------------------------------------
賦詩獨流涕，亂世想賢才
fu3 si1 duk6 lau4 tai3, lyun6 sai3 soeng2 jin4 coi4

soeng1 saan1 ji5 dak1 sat1, suk6 zyu2 tyut3 jim4 caai1
-----------------------------------------------------

leoi5 soeng6 fung1 gwok3 jap1, fu6 syut3 ji5 jim4 mui4
-----------------------------------------------------
景晏楚山深，水鶴去低回
ging2 aan3 co2 saan1 sam1, seoi2 hok6 heoi3 dai1 wui4
-----------------------------------------------------
龐公任本性，攜子臥蒼苔
pong4 gung1 jam6 bun2 sing3, kwai4 zi2 ngo6 cong1 toi4

4119 遣懷
hin2 waai4

昔我遊宋中，惟梁孝王都
sik1 ngo5 jau4 sung3 zung1, wai4 loeng4 haau3 wong4 dou1
-----------------------------------------------------
名今陳留亞，劇則貝魏俱
ming4 gam1 can4 lau4 aa3, kek6 zak1 bui3 ngai6 keoi1
-----------------------------------------------------
邑中九萬家，高棟照通衢
jap1 zung1 gau2 maan6 gaa1, gou1 dung6 ziu3 tung1 keoi4
-----------------------------------------------------
舟車半天下，主客多歡娛
zau1 geoi1 bun3 tin1 haa6, zyu2 haak3 do1 fun1 jyu4
-----------------------------------------------------
白刃讎不義，黃金傾有無
baak6 jan6 cau4 bat1 ji6, wong4 gam1 king1 jau5 mou4
-----------------------------------------------------
殺人紅塵裏，報答在斯須
saat3 jan4 hung4 can4 leoi5, bou3 daap3 zoi6 si1 seoi1
-----------------------------------------------------
憶與高李輩，論交入酒壚
jik1 jyu5 gou1 lei5 bui3, leon4 gaau1 jap6 zau2 lou4
-----------------------------------------------------
兩公壯藻思，得我色敷腴
loeng5 gung1 zong3 zou2 si1, dak1 ngo5 sik1 fu1 jyu4
-----------------------------------------------------
氣酣登吹臺，懷古視平蕪
hei3 ham4 dang1 ceoi1 toi4, waai4 gu2 si6 ping4 mou4
-----------------------------------------------------
芒碭雲一去，雁鶩空相呼
mong4 dong6 wan4 jat1 heoi3, ngaan6 mou6 hung1 soeng1 fu1
-----------------------------------------------------
先帝正好武，寰海未凋枯
sin1 dai3 zing3 hou2 mou5, waan4 hoi2 mei6 diu1 fu1
-----------------------------------------------------
猛將收西域，長戟破林胡
maang5 zoeng3 sau1 sai1 wik6, coeng4 gik1 po3 lam4 wu4
-----------------------------------------------------
百萬攻一城，獻捷不云輸
baak3 maan6 gung1 jat1 sing4, hin3 zit6 bat1 wan4 syu1
-----------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------
亂離朋友盡，合沓歲月徂
lyun6 lei4 pang4 jau5 zeon6, hap6 daap6 seoi3 jyut6 cou4
-----------------------------------------------------
吾衰將焉託，存歿再嗚呼
ng4 seoi1 zoeng1 jin1 tok3, cyun4 mut6 zoi3 wu1 fu1
-----------------------------------------------------
蕭條益堪愧，獨在天一隅
siu1 tiu4 jik1 ham1 kwai3, duk6 zoi6 tin1 jat1 jyu4
-----------------------------------------------------
乘黃已去矣，凡馬徒區區
sing4 wong4 ji5 heoi3 ji5, faan4 maa5 tou4 keoi1 keoi1
-----------------------------------------------------
不復見顏鮑，繫舟臥荆巫
bat1 fau6 gin3 ngaan4 baau6, hai6 zau1 ngo6 ging1 mou4
-----------------------------------------------------
臨餐吐更食，常恐違撫孤

4129 往在
wong5 zoi6

-----------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------

4556 課伐木
fo3 fat6 muk6

課隸人伯夷，幸秀，信行等，入谷斬陰木，人日四根止，維條伊枚，正直挺然，晨征暮返，委積庭內，我有藩籬，是缺是補，載伐篠簜，伊仗支持，則旅次於小安，山有虎，知禁，若恃爪牙之利，必昏黑撐突，夔人屋壁，列樹白菊，鏝爲牆，實以竹，示式遏，爲與虎近，混淪乎無良，賓客憂害馬之徒苟活爲幸，可嘿息已，作詩付宗武誦
fo3 lai6 jan4 baak3 ji4, hang6 sau3, seon3 hang4 dang2, jap6 guk1 zaam2 jam1 muk6, jan4 jat6 sei3 gan1 zi2, wai4 tiu4 ji1 mui4, zing3 zik6 ting5 jin4, san4 zing1 mou6 faan2, wai2 zik1 ting4 noi6, ngo5 jau5 faan4 lei4, si6 kyut3 si6 bou2, zoi3 fat6 siu2 dong6, ji1 zoeng6 zi1 ci4, zak1 leoi5 ci3 jyu1 siu2 on1, saan1 jau5 fu2, zi1 gam3, joek6 ci5 zaau2 ngaa4 zi1 lei6, bit1 fan1 hak1 caang1 dat6, kwai4 jan4 uk1 bik1, lit6 syu6 baak6 guk1, maan6 wai4 coeng4, sat6 ji5 zuk1, si6 sik1 aat3, wai6 jyu5 fu2 gan6, wan6 leon4 fu4 mou4 loeng4, ban1 haak3 jau1 hoi6 maa5 zi1 tou4 gau2 wut6 wai4 hang6, ho2 hei1 sik1 ji5, zok3 si1 fu6 zung1 mou5 zung6

hang4 gun1 zoeng1 mong6 bou2 dou6 kwai4 seoi2 gwai1

-----------------------------------------------------

cat1 jyut6 jat1 jat6 tai4 zung1 ming4 fu2 seoi2 lau4 ji6 sau2

-----------------------------------------------------

dung1 zing1 faan6 zi1 bun3, ngau4 lik6 maan5 loi4 san1
-----------------------------------------------------
深耕種數畝，未甚後四鄰
sam1 gaang1 zung3 sou3 mau5, mei6 sam6 hau6 sei3 leon4
-----------------------------------------------------
嘉蔬旣不一，名數頗具陳
gaa1 so1 gei3 bat1 jat1, ming4 sou3 po2 geoi6 can4
-----------------------------------------------------
荆巫非苦寒，采擷接青春
ging1 mou4 fei1 fu2 hon4, coi2 kit3 zip3 cing1 ceon1
-----------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------
雄者左翮垂，損傷已露筋
hung4 ze2 zo2 hat6 seoi4, syun2 soeng1 ji5 lou6 gan1
-----------------------------------------------------
一步再血流，尙經矰繳勤
jat1 bou6 zoi3 hyut3 lau4, soeng6 ging1 zang1 giu2 kan4
-----------------------------------------------------
三步六號叫，志屈悲哀頻
saam1 bou6 luk6 hou4 giu3, zi3 wat1 bei1 oi1 pan4
-----------------------------------------------------
鸞凰不相待，側頸訴高旻
lyun4 wong4 bat1 soeng1 doi6, zak1 geng2 sou3 gou1 man4
-----------------------------------------------------

4813 同元使君舂陵行
tung4 jyun4 si3 gwan1 zung1 ling4 hang4

覽道州元使君結舂陵行兼賊退後示官吏作二首，志之曰，當天子分憂之地，效漢官良吏之目，今盜賊未息，知民疾苦，得結輩十數公，落落然參錯天下爲邦伯，萬物吐氣，天下少安可得矣，不意復見比興體制，微婉頓挫之詞，感而有詩，增諸卷軸，簡知我者，不必寄元
laam5 dou6 zau1 jyun4 si3 gwan1 git3 zung1 ling4 hang4 gim1 caak6 teoi3 hau6 si6 gun1 lei6 zok3 ji6 sau2, zi3 zi1 jyut6, dong1 tin1 zi2 fan1 jau1 zi1 dei6, haau6 hon3 gun1 loeng4 lei6 zi1 muk6, gam1 dou6 caak6 mei6 sik1, zi1 man4 zat6 fu2, dak1 git3 bui3 sap6 sou3 gung1, lok6 lok6 jin4 cam1 cok3 tin1 haa6 wai4 bong1 baak3, maan6 mat6 tou3 hei3, tin1 haa6 siu2 on1 ho2 dak1 ji5, bat1 ji3 fau6 gin3 bei2 hing3 tai2 zai3, mei4 jyun2 deon6 cok3 zi1 ci4, gam2 ji4 jau5 si1, zang1 zyu1 gyun2 zuk6, gaan2 zi1 ngo5 ze2, bat1 bit1 gei3 jyun4

5092 登高
dang1 gou1

風急天高猿嘯哀，渚清沙白鳥飛迴。
fung1 gap1 tin1 gou1 jyun4 siu3 oi1, zyu2 cing1 saa1 baak6 niu5 fei1 wui4
平仄平平平仄平，仄平平仄仄平平
-----------------------------------------------------
無邊落木蕭蕭下，不盡長江滾滾來。
mou4 bin1 lok6 muk6 siu1 siu1 haa6, bat1 zeon6 coeng4 gong1 gwan2 gwan2 loi4
平平仄仄平平仄，仄仄平平仄仄平
-----------------------------------------------------
萬里悲秋常作客，百年多病獨登臺。
maan6 lei5 bei1 cau1 soeng4 zok3 haak3, baak3 nin4 do1 bing6 duk6 dang1 toi4
仄仄平平平仄仄，仄平平仄仄平平
-----------------------------------------------------
艱難苦恨繁霜鬢，潦倒新停濁酒杯。
gaan1 naan4 fu2 han6 faan4 soeng1 ban3, lou5 dou2 san1 ting4 zuk6 zau2 bui1
平平仄仄平平仄，仄仄平平仄仄平

【韻部】
〚3.2.7〛迴：灰韻
〚4.2.7〛來：灰韻
〚5.2.7〛臺：灰韻
〚6.2.7〛杯：灰韻

【體裁】
七律

【補充說明】
四聯皆對。
〚3〛丁寧：本聯中，天、風；沙、渚；猿嘯、鳥飛，均自然成對。而且還有句中自對，如上句「天」對「風」，「高」對「急」；下句「沙」對「渚」，「白」對「清」。
〚6〛丁寧：末二句句中自對：「艱難」對「苦恨」，「潦倒」對「新停」。
王力：依我看來，尾聯正是半對半不對。「艱難」對「潦倒」可以算是對仗；但其餘的就不好說是對仗。「繁霜鬢」應以「霜鬢」連讀，不應以「繁霜」連讀。……「苦恨繁霜鬢」只是「苦恨霜鬢已繁」，而不是「苦恨繁霜之鬢」，因此不能認爲是以「繁霜」與「濁酒」爲對仗。

永明按：
「潦倒」對「新停」爲借對，「潦」、「老」同音，「倒」、「停」同部；放在酒的語境當中，「老倒」對「新停」就更有意思了。

5288 寫懷二首

其一

lou4 sang1 gung6 kin4 kwan1, ho4 cyu3 ji6 fung1 zuk6
-----------------------------------------------------

jim5 jim5 zi6 ceoi1 ging6, hang4 hang4 gin3 gei1 cuk1
-----------------------------------------------------
無貴賤不悲，無富貧亦足
mou4 gwai3 zin6 bat1 bei1, mou4 fu3 pan4 jik6 zuk1
-----------------------------------------------------
萬古一骸骨，鄰家遞歌哭
maan6 gu2 jat1 haai4 gwat1, leon4 gaa1 dai6 go1 huk1
-----------------------------------------------------
鄙夫到巫峽，三歲如轉燭
pei2 fu1 dou3 mou4 haap6, saam1 seoi3 jyu4 zyun3 zuk1
-----------------------------------------------------
全命甘留滯，忘情任榮辱
cyun4 ming6 gam1 lau4 zai6, mong4 cing4 jam6 wing4 juk6
-----------------------------------------------------
朝班及暮齒，日給還脫粟
ciu4 baan1 kap6 mou6 ci2, jat6 kap1 waan4 tyut3 suk1
-----------------------------------------------------
編蓬石城東，采藥山北谷
pin1 pung4 sek6 sing4 dung1, coi2 joek6 saan1 bak1 guk1
-----------------------------------------------------
用心霜雪間，不必條蔓綠
jung6 sam1 soeng1 syut3 gaan1, bat1 bit1 tiu4 maan6 luk6
-----------------------------------------------------
非關故安排，曾是順幽獨
fei1 gwaan1 gu3 on1 paai4, cang4 si6 seon6 jau1 duk6
-----------------------------------------------------
達士如弦直，小人似鉤曲
daat6 si6 jyu4 jin4 zik6, siu2 jan4 ci5 ngau1 kuk1
-----------------------------------------------------
曲直吾不知，負暄候樵牧
kuk1 zik6 ng4 bat1 zi1, fu6 hyun1 hau6 ciu4 muk6

其二

夜深坐南軒，明月照我膝
je6 sam1 zo6 naam4 hin1, ming4 jyut6 ziu3 ngo5 sat1
-----------------------------------------------------

ging1 fung1 faan1 ho4 hon3, loeng4 dung6 ji5 ceot1 jat6
-----------------------------------------------------
羣生各一宿，飛動自儔匹
kwan4 sang1 gok3 jat1 suk1, fei1 dung6 zi6 cau4 pat1
-----------------------------------------------------
吾亦驅其兒，營營爲私實
ng4 jik6 keoi1 kei4 ji4, jing4 jing4 wai4 si1 sat6
-----------------------------------------------------
天寒行旅稀，歲暮日月疾
tin1 hon4 hang4 leoi5 hei1, seoi3 mou6 jat6 jyut6 zat6
-----------------------------------------------------
榮名忽中人，世亂如蟣虱
wing4 ming4 fat1 zung1 jan4, sai3 lyun6 jyu4 gei1 sat1
-----------------------------------------------------
古者三皇前，滿腹志願畢
gu2 ze2 saam1 wong4 cin4, mun5 fuk1 zi3 jyun6 bat1
-----------------------------------------------------
胡爲有結繩，陷此膠與漆
wu4 wai4 jau5 git3 sing4, haam6 ci2 gaau1 jyu5 cat1
-----------------------------------------------------
禍首燧人氏，厲階董狐筆
wo6 sau2 seoi6 jan4 si6, lai6 gaai1 dung2 wu4 bat1
-----------------------------------------------------
君看燈燭張，轉使飛蛾密
gwan1 hon3 dang1 zuk1 zoeng1, zyun2 si3 fei1 ngo4 mat6
-----------------------------------------------------
放神八極外，俛仰俱蕭瑟
fong3 san4 baat3 gik6 ngoi6, fu2 joeng5 keoi1 siu1 sat1
-----------------------------------------------------

5308 觀公孫大娘弟子舞劍器行
gun1/gun3 gung1 syun1 daai6 noeng4 dai6 zi2 mou5 gim3 hei3 hang4 unknown bing6/bing1/bing3 zeoi6 unknown

大曆二年十月十九日，夔府別駕元持宅，見臨潁李十二娘舞劍器，壯其蔚跂，問其所師，曰，余，公孫大娘弟子也，開元五載，余尙童稚，記於郾城觀公孫氏舞劍器渾脫，瀏灕頓挫，獨出冠時，自高頭宜春，梨園二伎坊內人，洎外供奉，曉是舞者，聖文神武皇帝初，公孫一人而已，玉貌錦衣，況余白首，今茲弟子，亦匪盛顏，旣辯其由來，知波瀾莫二，撫事慷慨，聊爲劍器行，往者吳人張旭善草書書帖，數嘗於鄴縣見公孫大娘舞西河劍器，自此草書長進，豪蕩感激，卽公孫可知矣
daai6 lik6 ji6 nin4 sap6 jyut6 sap6 gau2 jat6, kwai4 fu2 bit6 gaa3 jyun4 ci4 zaak6, gin3 lam4 wing6 lei5 sap6 ji6 noeng4 mou5 gim3 hei3, zong3 kei4 wai3 kei4, man6 kei4 so2 si1, jyut6, jyu4, gung1 syun1 daai6 noeng4 dai6 zi2 jaa5, hoi1 jyun4 ng5 zoi2, jyu4 soeng6 tung4 zi6, gei3 jyu1 jin2 sing4 gun1 gung1 syun1 si6 mou5 gim3 hei3 wan4 tyut3, lau4 lei4 deon6 co3, duk6 ceot1 gun1 si4, zi6 gou1 tau4 ji4 ceon1, lei4 jyun4 ji6 gei6 fong1 noi6 jan4, gei6 ngoi6 gung1 fung6, hiu2 si6 mou5 ze2, sing3 man4 san4 mou5 wong4 dai3 co1, gung1 syun1 jat1 jan4 ji4 ji5, juk6 maau6 gam2 ji1, fong3 jyu4 baak6 sau2, gam1 zi1 dai6 zi2, jik6 fei2 sing6 ngaan4, gei3 bin6 kei4 jau4 loi4, zi1 bo1 laan4 mok6 ji6, fu2 si6 kong2 koi3, liu4 wai4 gim3 hei3 hang4, wong5 ze2 ng4 jan4 zoeng1 juk1 sin6 cou2 syu1 syu1 tip3, sou3 soeng4 jyu1 jip6 jyun6 gin3 gung1 syun1 daai6 noeng4 mou5 sai1 ho4 gim3 hei3, zi6 ci2 cou2 syu1 zoeng2 zeon3, hou4 dong6 gam2 gik1, zik1 gung1 syun1 ho2 zi1 ji5

-----------------------------------------------------

蘇大侍御渙，靜者也，旅於江側，凡是不交州府之客，人事都絕久矣，肩輿江浦，忽訪老夫舟楫，而已茶酒內，余請誦近詩，肯吟數首，才力素壯，詞句動人，接對明日，憶其湧思雷出，書篋几杖之外，殷殷留金石聲，賦八韻記異，亦記老夫傾倒於蘇至矣
sou1 daai6 si6 jyu6 wun6, zing6 ze2 jaa5, leoi5 jyu1 gong1 zak1, faan4 si6 bat1 gaau1 zau1 fu2 zi1 haak3, jan4 si6 dou1 zyut6 gau2 ji5, gin1 jyu4 gong1 pou2, fat1 fong2 lou5 fu1 zau1 zip3, ji4 ji5 caa4 zau2 noi6, jyu4 cing2 zung6 gan6 si1, hang2 jam4 sou3 sau2, coi4 lik6 sou3 zong3, ci4 geoi3 dung6 jan4, zip3 deoi3 ming4 jat6, jik1 kei4 jung2 si1 leoi4 ceot1, syu1 haap6 gei2 zoeng6 zi1 ngoi6, jan1 jan1 lau4 gam1 sek6 sing1, fu3 baat3 wan6 gei3 ji6, jik6 gei3 lou5 fu1 king1 dou2 jyu1 sou1 zi3 ji5

龐公不浪出，蘇氏今有之
pong4 gung1 bat1 long6 ceot1, sou1 si6 gam1 jau5 zi1
-----------------------------------------------------
再聞誦新作，突過黃初詩
zoi3 man4 zung6 san1 zok3, dat6 gwo3 wong4 co1 si1
-----------------------------------------------------
乾坤幾反覆，揚馬宜同時
kin4 kwan1 gei2 faan2 fuk1, joeng4 maa5 ji4 tung4 si4
-----------------------------------------------------
今晨清鏡中，勝食齋房芝
gam1 san4 cing1 geng3 zung1, sing3 sik6 zaai1 fong4 zi1
-----------------------------------------------------
余髮喜卻變，白間生黑絲
jyu4 faat3 hei2 koek3 bin3, baak6 gaan3 sang1 hak1 si1
-----------------------------------------------------
昨夜舟火滅，湘娥簾外悲
zok3 je6 zau1 fo2 mit6, soeng1 ngo4 lim4 ngoi6 bei1
-----------------------------------------------------
百靈未敢散，風破寒江遲
baak3 ling4 mei6 gam2 saan3, fung1 po3 hon4 gong1 ci4

lou5 mun4 jyun4 geoi1 jik6 sang6 dang6, man4 dou6 jyu4 gam1 jau4 bei6 fung1

5938 朱鳳行
zyu1 fung6 hang4

5941 追酬故高蜀州人日見寄
zeoi1 cau4 gu3 gou1 suk6 zau1 jan4 jat6 gin3 gei3

開文書帙中，檢所遺忘，因得故高常侍適往居在成都時，高任蜀州刺史，人日相憶見寄詩，淚灑行間，讀終篇末，自枉詩已十餘年，莫記存沒，又六七年矣，老病懷舊，生意可知，今海內忘形故人，獨漢中王瑀與昭州敬使君超先在，愛而不見，情見乎辭，大曆五年正月二十一日，卻追酬高公此作，因寄王及敬弟
hoi1 man4 syu1 dit6 zung1, gim2 so2 wai4 mong4, jan1 dak1 gu3 gou1 soeng4 si6 sik1 wong5 geoi1 zoi6 sing4 dou1 si4, gou1 jam6 suk6 zau1 ci3 si2, jan4 jat6 soeng1 jik1 gin3 gei3 si1, leoi6 saa2 hong4 gaan1, duk6 zung1 pin1 mut6, zi6 wong2 si1 ji5 sap6 jyu4 nin4, mok6 gei3 cyun4 mut6, jau6 luk6 cat1 nin4 ji5, lou5 bing6 waai4 gau6, sang1 ji3 ho2 zi1, gam1 hoi2 noi6 mong4 jing4 gu3 jan4, duk6 hon3 zung1 wong4 jyu5 jyu5 ciu1 zau1 ging3 si3 gwan1 ciu1 sin1 zoi6, oi3 ji4 bat1 gin3, cing4 jin6 fu4 ci4, daai6 lik6 ng5 nin4 zing1 jyut6 ji6 sap6 jat1 jat6, koek3 zeoi1 cau4 gou1 gung1 ci2 zok3, jan1 gei3 wong4 kap6 ging3 dai6

自蒙蜀州人日作，不意清詩久零落
zi6 mung4 suk6 zau1 jan4 jat6 zok3, bat1 ji3 cing1 si1 gau2 ling4 lok6
-----------------------------------------------------
今晨散帙眼忽開，逬淚幽吟事如昨
gam1 san4 saan3 dit6 ngaan5 fat1 hoi1, bing3 leoi6 jau1 jam4 si6 jyu4 zok3
-----------------------------------------------------
嗚呼壯士多慷慨，合沓高名動寥廓

-----------------------------------------------------
歎我悽悽求友篇，感時鬱鬱匡君略
taan3 ngo5 cai1 cai1 kau4 jau5 pin1, gam2 si4 wat1 wat1 hong1 gwan1 loek6
-----------------------------------------------------
錦里春光空爛漫，瑤墀侍臣已冥寞

-----------------------------------------------------
瀟湘水國傍黿鼉，鄠杜秋天失雕鶚

-----------------------------------------------------
東西南北更堪論，白首扁舟病獨存

-----------------------------------------------------
遙拱北辰纏寇盜，欲傾東海洗乾坤

-----------------------------------------------------
邊塞西蕃最充斥，衣冠南渡多崩奔
bin1 coi3 sai1 faan4 zeoi3 cung1 cik1, ji1 gun1 naam4 dou6 do1 bang1 ban1
-----------------------------------------------------
鼓瑟至今悲帝子，曳裾何處覓王門
gu2 sat1 zi3 gam1 bei1 dai3 zi2, jai6 geoi1 ho4 cyu3 mik6 wong4 mun4
-----------------------------------------------------
文章曹植波瀾闊，服食劉安德業尊
man4 zoeng1 cou4 zik6 bo1 laan4 fut3, fuk6 sik6 lau4 on1 dak1 jip6 zyun1
-----------------------------------------------------
長笛誰能亂愁思，昭州詞翰與招魂
